ValidMaintainers.Description: GitHub users who maintain this folder. PR for changing this folder will only be accepted from these users.

CommunityInfo.Name: Pune User Group
CommunityInfo.Description_SessionizeApiId: If you have configured your Sessionize correctly then browsing to this url (replacing {Your sessionize event Id} with your event sessionize id) will return valid json: https://sessionize.com/api/v2/{Your sessionize event Id}/view/Sessions

Logo.Description: Community logo is a .png file 500X500px in this folder!

Locations.Description: Each location where your community will be running a Global Azure event.
Locations.Name: Pune
Locations.Address: 5th Floor, A-Wing, MCCIA Trade Tower, International Conventional Centre, 403-A, Senapati Bapat Road, Laxmi Society, Model Colony, Shivajinagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411016, India.
Locations.Description_Lat_Lon: The Lat and Lon location for where you want your community pin on the Global Azure Community Map (example 47.6457554, -122.1299952).
